title: Deployer duty: cooperate with competent authorities

article_refs.quote: Deployers shall cooperate with the relevant competent authorities in any action those authorities take in relation to the high-risk AI system in order to implement this Regulation.

legal_consequence.verbatim: Deployers shall cooperate with the relevant competent authorities in any action those authorities take in relation to the high-risk AI system in order to implement this Regulation.

items.label: Penalty (Art. 99)
items.text: Obligation/requirement; fines up to EUR 15,000,000 or 3% turnover may apply.
